Name: Charge Depletion Rate
Description: How much a neuron's Charge decays toward 0.0f each tick.

Name: Confidence Adjustment Down Rate
Description: If a link match is not correct this is how much confidence decays.

Name: Confidence Adjustment Up Rate
Description: How rapidly confidence increases on a correct stimulus match.

Name: Confidence Forget Factor
Description: How fast confidence decays over time.

Name: Confidence Forget Log Offset
Description: How much pre-age neuron link confidence gets when new relative to actual age. This is a power of two exponent.

Name: Connection Throttle
Description: How strongly links stimulus effect the neuron (gets multiplied by NEURON_UPSTREAM_LINKS_INVERSE.)

Name: Energy Depletion On Fire
Description: How much energy is subtracted if the neuron fires. For every Link this gets multiplied by the calculated stimulus.

Name: Energy Recharge Rate
Description: How much energy a neuron gains each tick.

Name: Growth Rate
Description: How much the cortex usable neurons expands per tick.

Name: High Energy Threshold
Description: If energy is above this then the neuron is changed to enabled.

Name: Learning Rate Age Factor
Description: Learning rate goes down by the base 2 log of age of the link multiplied by this factor.

Name: Learning Rate Forget Factor
Description: General how fast we forget.  Must be <= 1

Name: Learning Rate Forget Log Offset
Description: How much pre-age neuron links get when new relative to actual age. This is a power of two exponent.

Name: Learning Rate Goodness Factor
Description: How influential the goodness factor of the brain is on learning rate.

Name: Learning Rate Ticks Offset
Description: 0 is current charge of self. 1 is charge of self 1 tick ago. 2 is charge of self 2 ticks ago. Must NOT exceed NEURON_HISTORY - 1.

Name: Link Activity Decay Rate
Description: How much of the link activity is decayed each tick.

Name: Link Activity Learning Factor
Description: How much of the link activity is added to the link activity.

Name: Link Stimulus to Activity Factor
Description: How much of input stimulus absolute value is added to L.activity.

Name: Low Energy Threshold
Description: If energy falls below this the neuron is changed to disabled. It is too tired.

Name: Max Energy
Description: The highest reserve energy a neuron may have. This is the maximum value for energyCeiling.

Name: Maximum Confidence
Description: Confidence can not exceed this level.

Name: Minimum Confidence
Description: Confidence can not fall below this level.

Name: Overall Learning Rate
Description: General factor of learning rates speed.

Name: Reroute Confidence Set
Description: Initial confidence after a reroute.

Name: Reroute Probability
Description: Probability of a reroute on any given tick if confidence is below rerouteThreshold.

Name: Reroute Threshold
Description: If confidence falls below this then a reroute might happen.
